text: In the 2023 FIFA Women's World Cup, Group G is a part of the tournament where teams compete against each other. It will happen from July 20th to July 30th, 2023. The teams in this group are.Sweden, South Africa, Italy and Argentina. The two best teams from this group will move on to the next round, called the round of 16. == Teams == Draw position Team Pot Confederation Method of qualification Date of qualification Finals third place 29 July 2022 4th 2019 Group stage (2003, 2007, 2019) 29 28 Notes == Standings == In the round of 16: * The winners of Group G will advance to play the runners-up of Group E. * The runners-up of Group G will advance to play the winners of Group E. ==Matches== All times listed are local, NZST (UTC+12). ===Sweden vs South Africa=== {| style="font-size:90%" cellspacing="0"
